EmailTemplate.description: Contract is approaching Contract End/Anniversary Date - email to Managers
EmailTemplate.name: Approaching Contract End/Anniversary Date - Manager
EmailTemplate.subject: Your team's contracts expiring in the next 90 days
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!User.Name},
Please visit this link for the list of your account team's contracts expiring in the next 90 days.
Click here to access the report.
